qas.question: Many instruments originated during what era?
What has disappeared, then been recreated in order to perform music of the period?
Modern day instrument may be classified as brass, string, woodwind and what other classification?

context: Many instruments originated during <a0_0>the Renaissance<a0_0/>; others were variations of, or improvements upon, instruments that had existed previously. Some have survived to the present day; others have disappeared, only to be recreated in order to perform music of the period on <a1_0>authentic instruments<a1_0/>. As in the modern day, instruments may be classified as brass, strings, <a2_0>percussion<a2_0/>, and woodwind.
